title: Power of a Product Rule
text: For any real numbers a and $$b$$ and any integer $$n$$, the power of a product rule of exponents states that $${ab}^n=a^n b^n$$

title: Power of a Product Rule
text: Use the power of a product rule to simplify the expression: $${\left(2t\right)}^{15}=2^{15} t^{15}$$
